name: UFGVehicleWheel
comment: Copyright 2016 Coffee Stain Studios. All Rights Reserved.

methods.name: CreateWheelMesh
methods.comment: Creates and cooks a cylinder wheel mesh

properties.name: mInvertSteering
properties.comment: Set to true if a rear wheel. This can result in custom functionality for rear wheels.

properties.name: mAutoGenerateCollisionCylinder
properties.comment: Automatically generates a perfect collision cylinder that matches the wheel's dimensions.

properties.name: mPhysxWheelUserData
properties.comment: PhysXWheel User defineable data that is passed to the shader

properties.name: mPhysxUserData
properties.comment: PhysX User defineable data that is passed to the shader

properties.name: mCamberStiffness
properties.comment: camber stiffness. measured in radians per kg... or something.
